Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Taylor/Racine
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Racine, Roosevelt, Morgan and Taylor: due to, street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Racine, Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor and over regular route, due to street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
